overview: The Kirchner Cultural Center presents Estaré, a concert that celebrates the work of Palo Pandolfo (1964-2021). The members of Don Cornelio y la Zona, los Visitantes, La Fuerza Suave, El Ritual and La Hermandad perform Palo songs from different stages of their career together with guest artists.
title: Estaré: Homenaje a Palo Pandolfo
